components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description: Should TableView support vertical swiping? iOS does not. Mobile Web it does. TableViews scroll, so the swipe and scrolling conflict. Need to settle on a convention and create parity tickets for each platforms.
fields.summary: TiAPI: Define vertical swipe event behavior for Ti.UI.TableView
